title: Serial Dilution HC
author: Opentrons
description: Performs 2 separate serial dilutions in one 96-well plate. Dilute column A to D, and dilute column H to E. Optionally, add diluent to all wells as a last step.
process:
Distribute specified volume of buffer to columns B,C,D,F,G,H.
Distribute samples at specified volume in duplicate to columns A and E (1 tube to two wells).
Dilute 2X down rows, from A to D, and then E to H.
Dispense specified volume of diluent to every even row (if Diluent Volume is 0, this step will be omitted).

markdown.title: Serial Dilution HC
markdown.author: [Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)
markdown.description: Performs 2 separate serial dilutions in one 96-well plate. Dilute column A to D, and dilute column H to E. Optionally, add diluent to all wells as a last step.
markdown.process:
1. Distribute specified volume of buffer to columns B,C,D,F,G,H.
2. Distribute samples at specified volume in duplicate to columns A and E (1 tube to two wells).
3. Dilute 2X down rows, from A to D, and then E to H.
4. Dispense specified volume of diluent to every even row (if Diluent Volume is 0, this step will be omitted).
